cards.title: Proposal Presentation
cards.text: This presentation outlines the project's initial proposal, including goals, scope, and methodology. It provides a general overview of the plan and is intended for stakeholder approval.

cards.title: Progress Presentation-I
cards.text: This presentation details the first project progress, covering research, data collection, and early findings. It highlights any challenges and updates stakeholders. (50% complete)

cards.title: Progress Presentation-II
cards.text: The second progress presentation builds on the first, discussing key milestones, data analysis, and insights. It shows the projectâ€™s current status and progress. (90% complete)

cards.title: Final Presentation
cards.text: This final presentation provides a summary of the project, including the outcomes, conclusions, and recommendations. It serves as the project closure document. (100% complete)
